cards.name: Venser, the Sojourner
cards.text:
+2: Exile target permanent you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.
−1: Creatures can't be blocked this turn.
−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent."

cards.flavor: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."
cards.name: Whitemane Lion
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Augury Owl
cards.text:
Flying
When Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Coral Fighters
cards.text: Whenever Coral Fighters attacks and isn't blocked, look at the top card of defending player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.

cards.flavor: Woven from threads of the spirit world, the mistcloak rendered its wearer invisible, but quickly fell to tatters.
cards.name: Minamo Sightbender
cards.text: {X}, {T}: Target creature with power X or less can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: Olka collected the evening mist for years, studying its secrets. Once she learned its essence, she could vanish with a thought.
cards.name: Mistmeadow Witch
cards.text: {2}{W}{U}: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: I've learned how to disable wards, pick locks, and decode the Agaran language—all before even reading the scroll!
cards.name: Scroll Thief
cards.text: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

cards.flavor: "They won't see your shadow or hear your breath, but they will feel your blade."
cards.name: Neurok Invisimancer
cards.text:
Neurok Invisimancer can't be blocked.
When Neurok Invisimancer enters the battlefield, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: A slith's form and function are determined by the color of the sun under which it's born.
cards.name: Slith Strider
cards.text:
Whenever Slith Strider becomes blocked, draw a card.
Whenever Slith Strider deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.flavor:
"Like a strain of music: easy to remember but impossible to catch."
—Mirri of the Weatherlight
cards.name: Sky Spirit
cards.text: Flying, first strike

cards.flavor: It provides what every discerning mage requires—time to think.
cards.name: Wall of Denial
cards.text:
Defender, flying
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

cards.name: Galepowder Mage
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Galepowder Mage attacks, exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: Kor have no concept of exploration. They return to homelands forgotten.
cards.name: Kor Cartographer
cards.text: When Kor Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: The shapeshifter mimics with a twin's esteem and a mirror's cruelty.
cards.name: Clone
cards.text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

cards.name: Cryptic Annelid
cards.text: When Cryptic Annelid enters the battlefield, scry 1, then scry 2, then scry 3. (To scry X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.flavor: Tocasia brushed the gears and cogs from the table. There, before two wide-eyed brothers, she began a lesson on raw elemental magic.
cards.name: Primal Plasma
cards.text: As Primal Plasma enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 creature, a 2/2 creature with flying, or a 1/6 creature with defender.

cards.name: Sawtooth Loon
cards.text:
Flying
When Sawtooth Loon enters the battlefield, return a white or blue creature you control to its owner's hand.
When Sawtooth Loon enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your library.

cards.flavor: What the current doesn't take, they do.
cards.name: Cache Raiders
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Windreaver
cards.text:
Flying
{W}: Windreaver gains vigilance until end of turn.
{W}: Windreaver gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
{U}: Switch Windreaver's power and toughness until end of turn.
{U}: Return Windreaver to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: After Efrava was destroyed, the cat warriors scattered across Dominaria. Those who followed Jedit's example were strong enough to survive the ravages of apocalypse.
cards.name: Jedit's Dragoons
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Jedit's Dragoons enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

cards.flavor: There may exist powers even greater than Phyrexia.
cards.name: Sunblast Angel
cards.text:
Flying
When Sunblast Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all tapped creatures.

cards.name: Sphinx of Uthuun
cards.text:
Flying
When Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.name: Path to Exile
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

cards.name: Preordain
cards.text: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.flavor: Arrows are only one way to remove an enemy.
cards.name: Sigil of Sleep
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor:
"No half measures, no regrets. We'll tell no stories of this day. It will be as if it never existed at all."
—Ganedor, loxodon mystic
cards.name: Revoke Existence
cards.text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor:
"If only an angel's wings could shelter us all."
—Barrin, master wizard
cards.name: Angelic Shield
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +0/+1.
Sacrifice Angelic Shield: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Oblivion Ring
cards.text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.flavor: With one flap of her wings, the angel beat back the fires of war.
cards.name: Safe Passage
cards.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.

cards.name: Steel of the Godhead
cards.text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked.

cards.flavor: Out of sight, into mind.
cards.name: Vanish into Memory
cards.text: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.

cards.flavor: With one commanding word, the spell was put down and a fine collected for its casting.
cards.name: Overrule
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. You gain X life.

cards.name: Azorius Chancery
cards.text:
Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped.
When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Flood Plain
cards.text:
Flood Plain enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice Flood Plain: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: New Benalia
cards.text:
New Benalia enters the battlefield tapped.
When New Benalia enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Sejiri Refuge
cards.text:
Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Soaring Seacliff
cards.text:
Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield tapped.
When Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Koth of the Hammer
cards.text:
+1: Untap target Mountain. It becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
−2: Add {R} to your mana pool for each Mountain you control.
−5: You get an emblem with "Mountains you control have ‘{T}: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player.'"

cards.flavor: It prefers a cooked meal, so it will eat you now and lava-bask later.
cards.name: Plated Geopede
cards.text:
First strike
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Plated Geopede gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
Do not judge a lizard by its size.
—Ghitu proverb
cards.name: Pygmy Pyrosaur
cards.text:
Pygmy Pyrosaur can't block.
{R}: Pygmy Pyrosaur gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The kor send their thopter kites to see if the land is in a welcoming mood.
cards.name: Pilgrim's Eye
cards.text:
Flying
When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Æther Membrane
cards.text:
Defender; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Æther Membrane blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat.

cards.flavor:
"I had hoped to instill in it the loyalty of a guard dog, but with fire's power comes its unpredictability."
—Maggath, Sardian elementalist
cards.name: Fiery Hellhound
cards.text: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Vulshok sorcerers train by leaping into electrified storm clouds. Dead or alive, they come back down with smiles on their faces.
cards.name: Vulshok Sorcerer
cards.text:
Haste
{T}: Vulshok Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor:
"Molten earth has no anger of its own. Only by infusing it with your own rage can the magma seethe and take shape."
—Koth of the Hammer
cards.name: Anger
cards.text:
Haste
As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.

cards.flavor:
"Cosi has many followers. Even the volcano finds a way to do his bidding."
—Zakken, Enclave cleric
cards.name: Cosi's Ravager
cards.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Cosi's Ravager deal 1 damage to target player.

cards.flavor: He experiences every emotion with passion and repays every slight with vengeance.
cards.name: Vulshok Berserker
cards.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

cards.flavor: Heart of fire, blood of lava, teeth of stone.
cards.name: Bloodfire Kavu
cards.text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Kavu: Bloodfire Kavu deals 2 damage to each creature.

cards.flavor: A typical day for a giant. A momentous event for a goat.
cards.name: Stone Giant
cards.text: {T}: Target creature you control with toughness less than Stone Giant's power gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor:
"Quit pontificating, mage. The last thing we want to do is give it more hot air."
—Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate
cards.name: Geyser Glider
cards.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyser Glider gains flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor: It's viciously territorial, destroying every creature on the mountain it has chosen to consume.
cards.name: Lithophage
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Lithophage unless you sacrifice a Mountain.

cards.name: Torchling
cards.text:
{R}: Untap Torchling.
{R}: Target creature blocks Torchling this turn if able.
{R}: Change the target of target spell that targets only Torchling.
{1}: Torchling gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}: Torchling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Chartooth Cougar
cards.text:
{R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.flavor:
"Fire. Air. Water. These elements spread, filling in the spaces they are not. But earth is implacable like a sullen child."
—Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity
cards.name: Earth Servant
cards.text: Earth Servant gets +0/+1 for each Mountain you control.

cards.flavor: Having charted their way up the difficult face, the two mountaineers had to contend with the mountain's decision to stand up.
cards.name: Greater Stone Spirit
cards.text:
Greater Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying.
{2}{R}: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and gains "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

cards.flavor: It took all its strength to contain the fire within.
cards.name: Bloodfire Colossus
cards.text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Colossus: Bloodfire Colossus deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

cards.flavor: It is the forest beyond the horizon, the mountain waiting to be climbed, the new land across the endless sea.
cards.name: Wayfarer's Bauble
cards.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages—until now.
cards.name: Armillary Sphere
cards.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor:
"From the clouds, you can see as far as the distant horizon. It's a reminder of the infinite possibilities of everyday life."
—Noboru, master kitemaker
cards.name: Journeyer's Kite
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Vulshok Morningstar
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Searing Blaze
cards.text:
Searing Blaze deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to target creature that player controls.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, Searing Blaze deals 3 damage to that player and 3 damage to that creature instead.

cards.name: Vulshok Battlegear
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +3/+3.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

cards.name: Downhill Charge
cards.text:
You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay Downhill Charge's mana cost.
Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

cards.flavor:
"Life up here is simple. Adapt to the ways of the mountains and they will reward you. Fight them and they will end you."
—Kezim, prodigal pyromancer
cards.name: Seismic Strike
cards.text: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

cards.flavor: Goblin lessons include the 2,071 tips for survival. Frek only remembered 2,070.
cards.name: Spire Barrage
cards.text: Spire Barrage deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of Mountains you control.

cards.flavor: When giants find their mountain homes infested, they have a whole range of solutions.
cards.name: Jaws of Stone
cards.text: Jaws of Stone deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you cast Jaws of Stone.

cards.name: Volley of Boulders
cards.text:
Volley of Boulders deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
Flashback {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
